name: i Pick Skills
description:
The void enemy is coming, warriors, pick up your weapons and defend the world!

Game features
· Dynamically built skills: Choose your skills carefully! Learn 200+ different skills during the battle, use combinations and combinations to make the skills more powerful and defeat the enemy.
·Characters with unique characteristics: an ordinary warrior who focuses on growth, a half-blood monk who is the most powerful at half-health, a super magician who pursues pure magical power... Each character can bring a different and unique experience!
·Changing enemy world: Each enemy you encounter has a different physique, and they are carefully calculated; choose Broken World or Distant Journey, and there will be different world effects! World effects will powerfully affect the entire battle, bringing a crazy situation to the entire battle...
